summary: This document is a certification of beneficial ownership for an account opened by Jeffrey E. Epstein on behalf of the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc. It includes details about Epstein's role as president and the foundation's legal status and address.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the president of the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc., and is responsible for opening the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, 83 St Thomas, USVI 00802
keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the president of the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc.
The foundation is a 501(c)(3) private foundation registered in the US Virgin Islands.
The document certifies that Epstein is responsible for managing the legal entity.
No individuals were reported to own 25 percent or more of the equity interests in the foundation.
